sentences.english: A low-solids mud in which there is no clay deflocculant chemical.
sentences.chinese: 不含粘土解絮凝化学剂的低固相泥浆。

sentences.english: This information will be used to help determine the cement slurry specifications for both the dump bailer and cement packer.
sentences.chinese: 这个信息将用来为倾卸筒和水泥封割器确定泥浆规格。

sentences.english: Pedestrians were splashed to the HIP in muddy slush.
sentences.chinese: 行人走在泥浆中，下半身全溅上了污泥。

sentences.english: A hydrocyclone device that removes large drill solids from the whole mud system.
sentences.chinese: 一种从整个泥浆系统中除去大钻屑的水力旋流装置。

sentences.english: Slurry is metered to the tine by a positive displacement pump.
sentences.chinese: 用一台容积泵测量泥浆尖头。

sentences.english: GIW offers a complete range of heavy-duty slurry pumps for FGD system scrubbers.
sentences.chinese: GIW为FGD系统洗涤器提供完备的重型泥浆泵。

sentences.english: It rained and the rain turned dust into mud.
sentences.chinese: 天下着雨，雨水把尘土变成了泥浆。

sentences.english: A flowline mud sample contains drill cuttings entrained in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 流线泥浆样本的泥浆中夹带有钻屑。

sentences.english: A flowline mud sample contains drill cuttings entrained in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 流线泥浆样本的泥浆中夹带有钻屑。

sentences.english: Some of these overflows have darkened the northwestern flanks.
sentences.chinese: 一些泛滥出的泥浆已经将西北侧山麓染成黑色。

sentences.english: Separate holding tanks can be installed to accumulate this slurry prior to dewatering.
sentences.chinese: 可以安装分开的接受器在脱水之前积累这泥浆。

sentences.english: The member of the drilling crew in charge of the mud-processing area during periods of circulation.
sentences.chinese: 泥浆循环期间管理泥浆处理区的井队人员。

sentences.english: The member of the drilling crew in charge of the mud-processing area during periods of circulation.
sentences.chinese: 泥浆循环期间管理泥浆处理区的井队人员。

sentences.english: He reached for it with both hands and stirred up the milky mud at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 他用双手去捉，把水底的乳白色泥浆全搅浑了。

sentences.english: A gelled-up mud may not be pumpable without exceeding limits on pump pressure.
sentences.chinese: 稠化泥浆在泵的压力限度内不可泵。

sentences.english: A sample of mud from the deepest or current drilling depth of a well.
sentences.chinese: 从井眼的最深处或目前钻进深度处采集的泥浆样本。
